p: 2,2-diphenyl-1-picrylhydrazyl (DPPH), 2,2'-azinobis (3-ethylbenzothiazoline-6-sunfonic acid) (ABTS), ascorbic acid, Clostridium histolyticum collagenase type I, N-[3-(2-furyl) acryloyl]-Leu-Gly-Pro-Ala (FALGPA), porcine pancreas elastase type I, N-Succinyl-Ala-Ala-Ala-p-nitroanilide (AAAPVN), epigallocatechin gallate (EGCG), trizma ® base, and potassium persulfate were purchased from Sigma–Aldrich; Merck for dimethyl sulfoxide.
